description: Security best practices for healthcare applications

rules.title: Missing Essential Security Headers
rules.description: One or more essential security headers are missing from the HTTP response
rules.why_it_matters: Security headers like CSP, HSTS, and X-Frame-Options provide critical defense-in-depth against common web vulnerabilities like XSS, clickjacking, and protocol downgrades.
rules.resolution: Configure your web server to include all essential security headers (CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, Referrer-Policy, Permissions-Policy).

rules.title: Insecure Connection (HTTP)
rules.description: The site is being served over an insecure HTTP connection instead of HTTPS
rules.why_it_matters: All healthcare applications must use HTTPS to encrypt data in transit and protect against man-in-the-middle attacks, as required by HIPAA Technical Safeguards.
rules.what_happened: Site is served over insecure HTTP protocol
rules.resolution: Redirect all HTTP traffic to HTTPS and ensure a valid TLS certificate is installed.
